title: Linux for Web Development
description: Why Linux is the preferred choice for web developers and how to set up your perfect development environment.
longDescription: Linux has become the go-to operating system for web developers worldwide. With native support for all major programming languages, powerful command-line tools, and seamless integration with servers (which mostly run Linux), it provides an unmatched development experience. OmniSet makes it easy to set up a complete web development environment in minutes.
benefits: Native terminal with bash/zsh - same as production servers
Package managers for easy tool installation
Docker runs natively without virtualization overhead
Free and open source - no licensing costs

gettingStarted.title: Choose a Distribution
gettingStarted.description: Ubuntu or Pop!_OS are excellent choices for web development. They have great hardware support and large communities.

gettingStarted.title: Run OmniSet
gettingStarted.description: Use the Fullstack Dev profile or select individual modules like Node.js, Docker, and VS Code.

gettingStarted.title: Configure Your Editor
gettingStarted.description: Install VS Code extensions for your tech stack - ESLint, Prettier, GitLens, and language-specific tools.

gettingStarted.title: Set Up Version Control
gettingStarted.description: Configure Git with your credentials and SSH keys for GitHub/GitLab.
